Text: How about the impact of the second airplane hitting tower nr. 2 causing air pressure changes thus sucking smoke out of tower 1? Not enough cloak-and-dagger?

Nice try "Lerssoni".

The building in the frame at 00:43 IS the South Tower where the second airliner had crashed!

Heads-up! The smoke puffs coming out on ALL sides, all around on the very same floor coincide with the start of the big "unreported" explosion from the North Tower, which is for some reason, off screen to the left.

It seems like the big "visual" fireball explosion in the North Tower was rigged to hide the sound and smoke of the explosions in the South Tower, note that the giant flames and subsequent smoke from the North Tower effectively camouflage the smoke from the explosions in the South Tower.

It would be VERY interesting to know the exact timing of this shot.
